name: plus
description: Adds a number to another number.

name: minus
description: Subtracts a number from another number.

name: modulo
description: Returns the remainder of a division operation.

name: times
description: Multiplies a number by another number.

name: floor
description: Rounds the input down to the nearest whole number

name: ceil
description: Rounds the input up to the nearest whole number

name: round
description: Rounds a number to the nearest integer or, if a number is passed as an argument, to that number of decimal places

name: divided_by
description: Divides a number by another number.

name: abs
description: Returns the absolute value of a number

name: at_least
description: Limits a number to a minimum value

name: at_most
description: Limits a number to a maximum value

name: append
description: append string to input.

name: prepend
description: prepend string to input.

name: capitalize
description: capitalize first letter of input.

name: upcase
description: convert input to uppercase.

name: downcase
description: convert input to lowercase.

name: strip
description: remove whitespace from input.

name: lstrip
description: Removes all whitespace (tabs, spaces, and newlines) from the left side of a string.

name: rstrip
description: Removes all whitespace (tabs, spaces, and newlines) from the right side of a string.

name: strip_newlines
description: Removes any newline characters (line breaks) from a string.

name: split
description: Divides a string into an array using the argument as a separator.

name: replace
description: Replaces every occurrence of the first argument in a string with the second argument.

name: replace_first
description: Replaces only the first occurrence of the first argument in a string with the second argument.

name: replace_last
description: Replaces only the last occurrence of the first argument in a string with the second argument.

name: remove
description: Removes every occurrence of the specified substring from a string.

name: remove_first
description: Removes only the first occurrence of the specified substring from a string.

name: remove_last
description: Removes only the last occurrence of the specified substring from a string.

name: truncate
description: Shortens a string down to the number of characters passed as an argument.

name: truncatewords
description: Shortens a string down to the number of words passed as an argument.

name: normalize_whitespace
description: Replace any occurrence of whitespace with a single space.

name: number_of_words
description: Count the number of words in some text.

name: array_to_sentence_string
description: Convert an array into a sentence, useful for listing tags.

name: escape
description: escapes a string by replacing HTML special characters with escape sequences.

name: escape_once
description: escapes a string without changing existing escaped entities.

name: url_encode
description: converts any URL-unsafe characters in a string into percent-encoded characters.

name: url_decode
description: decodes a string that has been encoded as a URL.

name: strip_html
description: removes any HTML tags from a string.

name: newline_to_br
description: replaces every newline in a string with an HTML line break.

name: xml_escape
description: escape some text for use in XML.

name: cgi_escape
description: CGI escape a string for use in a URL.

name: uri_escape
description: percent encodes any special characters in a URI.

name: slugify
description: convert a string into a lowercase URL “slug”.

name: slice
description: Returns a substring of 1 character beginning at the index specified by the first argument.

name: map
description: Creates an array of values by extracting the values of a named property from another object.

name: sort
description: Sorts items in an array in case-sensitive order.

name: sort_natural
description: Sorts items in an array in case-insensitive order.

name: uniq
description: remove duplicate elements from array.

name: where
description: Creates an array including only the objects with a given property value, or any truthy value by default.

name: where_exp
description: Select all the objects in an array where the expression is true.

name: group_by
description: Group an array’s items by a given property.

name: group_by_exp
description: Group an array’s items using a Liquid expression.

name: find
description: Return the first object in an array for which the queried attribute has the given value or return nil if no item in the array satisfies the given criteria.

name: find_exp
description: Return the first object in an array for which the given expression evaluates to true or return nil if no item in the array satisfies the evaluated expression.

name: first
description: Returns the first item of an array.

name: last
description: Returns the last item of an array.

name: join
description: Combines the items in an array into a single string using the argument as a separator.

name: reverse
description: Reverses the order of the items in an array.

name: concat
description: Concatenates (joins together) multiple arrays, the resulting array contains all the items from the input arrays.

name: compact
description: Removes any nil values from an array.

name: size
description: Returns the number of characters in a string or the number of items in an array.

name: push
description: Push an element into array. It’s NON-DESTRUCTIVE, i.e. it does not mutate the array, but rather make a copy and mutate that.

name: pop
description: Pop an element from the array. It’s NON-DESTRUCTIVE, i.e. it does not mutate the array, but rather make a copy and mutate that.

name: shift
description: Shift an element from the array. It’s NON-DESTRUCTIVE, i.e. it does not mutate the array, but rather make a copy and mutate that.

name: unshift
description: Unshift an element to the front of the array. It’s NON-DESTRUCTIVE, i.e. it does not mutate the array, but rather make a copy and mutate that.

name: date
description: Used to convert a timestamp into the specified format.

name: date_to_xmlschema
description: Convert a Date into XML Schema (ISO 8601) format.

name: date_to_rfc822
description: Convert a Date into the RFC-822 format used for RSS feeds.

name: date_to_string
description: Convert a date to short format.

name: date_to_long_string
description: Convert a date to long format.

name: default
description: Allows you to specify a fallback in case a value doesn’t exist.

name: json
description: Convert values to string via JSON.stringify(), for debug purpose.

name: jsonify
description: Convert values to string via JSON.stringify(), for debug purpose, like json filter.

name: inspect
description: Similar with json, but inspect allows cyclic structure.

name: raw
description: Directly returns the value of the variable.

name: to_integer
description: Convert values to number.
